forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 23C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plenty of sunshine. High around 75F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 22C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 72F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 20C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 68F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 61F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
